nodes.text: Darth Vader: Sith Lord is a canon young-readers reference book in Scholastic's Backstories series. It was written by Jason Fry and published on February 28, 2017. The book's story is told as an in-universe holographic log once recorded by Darth Vader and since recovered by New Republic Intelligence.

Who is Darth Vader? How did the once great Jedi become a fearsome villain? Who are the allies and foes Darth Vader has faced? In this biography—complete with black-and-white illustrations, timelines, and character profiles—young readers will delight in learning the complete history of the Sith Lord.
